scripts.clear: clear; rm -rf node_modules package-lock.json bun.lockb; bun i; bun run build
scripts.maker: bun run fresh; rm -rf tsconfig.npm.tsbuildinfo; bunx tsc -p tsconfig.json
scripts.patch: bun run maker; npm version patch; npm publish --access public
scripts.minor: bun run maker; npm version minor; npm publish --access public
scripts.major: bun run maker; npm version major; npm publish --access public
